entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
